name: Establish the connection
description:
In this game you have to establish the connection between two devices to send an important text message! Try to increase the signal's range without losing the connection!

This game was made for Extra Credits Game Jam #4. The theme "connect" was interpreted as building a connection between two devices by increasing a device's signal.

Controls

Press the space bar when the moving circle and the outermost circle overlap. Keeping up a streak of perfect timings will increase your range even faster.
